Name: Mini mixer grinder with 2 stainless jar - Stylo 500
Short description: The Stylo 500 mixer grinder by Kutchina is a solid kitchen appliance for your everyday kitchen needs. The mixer grinder is designed superior mixing and grinding performance. The three stainless steel jars of the appliance are made of high-grade stainless steel that ensures durability. The anti-skid feet provide a firm grip. The razor-sharp blades chop, cut, and mix all the ingredients precisely, be it of any size or shape. The appliance comes with the three-speed regulating knob so that you can grind different food ingredients and get the desired texture. The product and the motor come with two and five years warranty respectively.
Description: ['Wattage: The Kutchina Stylo 500 mixer grinder comes with a powerful 500 W motor that offers you best-in-class grinding experience. Count on this multipurpose kitchen appliance for all your grinding needs.\xa0', 'Stainless steel blades: Whether you want to grind whole masalas, make shakes and smoothies, or prepare chutneys and batter – this multipurpose kitchen appliance has super sharp stainless steel blades that help you prepare it all.\xa0', 'Number of jars: The three stainless steel jars that come with the appliance are durable and stylish. The sleek finish and the firm handles of the jars make them easy to use. The medium-sized jar is ideal for chutneys and the small is perfect for grinding whole spices. Use the big one for blending liquids.\xa0', 'Jar lock: The jar lock feature of the mixer grinder keeps the jars secured to avoid spillage.\xa0', 'Speed control: The appliance comes with a three-speed regulating knob that lets you adjust the consistency of the food ingredients you are processing.\xa0', 'Easy cleaning: Always clean the appliance regularly after use to avoid stubborn stains. Clean all the jars with water and dishwashing liquid and let them dry. To clean the appliance, you can use a microfibre cloth.\xa0', 'Easy to store: The multipurpose kitchen appliance doesn’t take up a lot of room in the kitchen.\xa0', 'Anti-skid feet: The anti-skid rubber feet prevent the appliance from sliding off the kitchen countertop. This lets you carry out your tasks efficiently.', 'Warranty: The product has two years of warranty and the motor comes with five years of warranty.\xa0']

Name: Mixer Grinder with stainless jar 500 watt - Turbo 500
Short description: Whip up chutneys, prepare yummy smoothies and shakes, and grind masalas effortlessly with the Kutchina Turbo 500 mixer grinder. Thanks to the powerful 500 W motor, the appliance efficiently takes care of all the mincing and mixing tasks without any hassle. With its three multipurpose stainless steel jars, the mixer grinder makes preparation easy and convenient. It comes in a compact setup that is very easy to store in your kitchen. Besides, the appliance is equipped with anti-skid feet that ensure a firm grip over the kitchen counter. The appliance is elegantly designed to add a touch of sophistication to your kitchen. Moreover, the three-speed regulating knob makes it convenient to achieve the desired consistency of ingredients while processing.  The product comes with a two years warranty and the motor has five years warranty.
Description: ['Wattage: The Kutchina Turbo 500 mixer grinder is powered by a 500 W motor, which enables you to grind and mix ingredients, without any hassle. Name: Mixer Grinder with stainless jar 502 watt - Nexa 500
Short description: Blend and grind food ingredients to perfection, thanks to Nexa 500 mixer grinder by Kutchina. With 502W power function, the appliance comes with three stainless steel jars – a liquidising jar, a chutney jar, and a dry grind jar. The mixer grinder sports an elegant and ergonomic design.  A perfect blend of aesthetics and advanced technology, the mixer grinder simplifies your tasks to a large extent. The user-friendly three-speed knob feature allows you to adjust the speed of the motor as per your needs. The super sharp blades conveniently take care of various tasks including mincing, blending, mixing, and grinding in a jiffy. Kutchina offers two years warranty on the product and five years on the motor.
Description: ['Wattage: The Nexa 500 mixer grinder by Kutchina has 502 W powerful motor that is powerful enough to carry out various blending tasks. Name: Mixer Grinder with stainless jar 550 watt - Misi dlx 550
Short description: Are you someone who prefers to use home-made masalas for your family? If yes, Kutchina MISI DLX 550 mixer grinder is your perfect kitchen companion. The combination of a high-power copper wound motor and precision blades gives this model a superior grinding capacity. In other words, you can totally rely on this model to grind and mince various types of whole spices and herbs.Using the dedicated control knob, you can easily choose from three grinding speeds. Three separate jars, including a wet jar, dry jar, and chutney jar come with this model.
Description: ['Wattage: Optimally designed for uncompromised performance, the Misi DLX 550 mixer grinder by Kutchina allows you to grind food ingredients with little to no effort.
